name: devtools-webapp
description: Optimized developer tools with lazy loading and performance optimizations

scripts.deploy:manual: npm run build && cd dist && git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy optimized build' && git push -f origin master:gh-pages
scripts.deploy:github: echo 'Deployment handled by GitHub Actions. Push to master branch to trigger.'
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze:bundle && npm run analyze:lighthouse
scripts.analyze:bundle: echo 'Analyzing bundle size...' && find . -name '*.js' -o -name '*.css' | head -10 | xargs wc -c
scripts.setup:ghpages: echo 'Setting up GitHub Pages...' && git checkout --orphan gh-pages && git rm -rf . && echo 'GitHub Pages branch created. Run npm run deploy:manual to deploy.'

author: KhanhND
